-- Megatron / Switchblade --

The battle sounds tell Megatron that it's time to make an 
entrance. "I shouldn't send minions to do something, unless I want 
it done correctly." With a red flash of anger showing in his eyes, 
he he leaps out of the base, and swings himself up on top of the 
base. 

With a quick glance around the battlefield, he picks out Shadow Star 
and Quickstrike dueling, the sides leaning in Shadow Star's favour,
a unknown Tripred (Burrock) was fighting with Inferno, and another 
Tripred (Spike) had just engaged Warhead.

Seizing the opertunity, as he spots that Shadow Star was 
concentrating on Quickstrike, his dragon head arm sends two plasma 
blasts streaking towards the Tripred. He prepares for return fire, 
as his red optics finally find a lone Tripred, who could only be 
their leader.

-------------------------------------

Switchblade frowns, as he starts hacking the lock combo on a 
slightly larger storage container. His green optics flicker, giving 
away his irritation. 

Switchblade redoubles his efforts, nearing a succesful unlock, "Damn 
locks are made better these days... but still not good enough for 
me." He makes short work of the last part of the protection, and 
with a victorious evil grin opens the lid.

His grin is short lived, as a violent explosion is triggered by his 
opening the case. Switchblade is thrown backwards, and he smashes 
into another containder, scratching it's hard covering slightly.

"Th..." *bzzt* "That..." He struggles to get to his feet grumbling 
to himself, "was unexpected. I never would have thought that a 
maximal container would have such an archaeic trap... sometimes I 
think too much. One mistake I won't make again..."

He drags himself across the floor, his left arm hanging in tatters 
from his side, and significant damage to his upper and lower torso. 
His head escaped relatively unscathed, likely due to left arm, which 
took the brunt of the explosion. Being such a feather weight bot, he 
was easily tossed by the explosion.

He looks into the mysterious box.

-------------------------------------

ooC:

As for the artifacts storyline idea, I'm guessing that people don't 
mind that much. Therefore, I'll go ahead with it, but I'm not sure 
what the effect of the of the artifacts will be, so i'm going to 
encourage that people email me with ideas. =) I'll choose the best 
one, or a combination of effects. Since this is a storyline thing, 
It does sorta affect everyone. =)

Kyle, in reply to this post which is copy/pasted at the bottom of 
this email:

Ok, that's fine with me. =)
